content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I received an AI response to delete the file "my_file.txt" using the "delete_file" command in the "Atlas/executed_code/" directory. The action was successful, as confirmed by the computer's response.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "favorite_books.txt"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command read_file returned: My favorite books:\n\n1. To Kill a Mockingbird by Harper Lee\n2. 1984 by George Orwell\n3. The Great Gatsby by F. Scott Fitzgerald\n4. Pride and Prejudice by Jane Austen\n5. The Catcher in the Rye by J.D. Salinger', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_python_file", "args": {"filename": "Atlas/executed_code/my_script.py"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "replace_in_file", "args": {"filename": "favorite_books.txt", "old_text": "The Great Gatsby by F. Scott Fitzgerald", "new_text": "The Adventures of Huckleberry Finn by Mark Twain", "occurrence_index": 1}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command replace_in_file returned: Occurrence index 1 is out of range for The Great Gatsby by F. Scott Fitzgerald in /home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/favorite_books.txt', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "append_to_file", "args": {"filename": "favorite_books.txt", "text": "\\n6. The Lord of the Rings by J.R.R. Tolkien"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "delete_file", "args": {"filename": "favorite_books.txt"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command delete_file returned: File deleted successfully.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "list_files", "args": {"directory": "/home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command list_files returned: ['atlas.yaml', 'atlas.settings.yaml', 'file_logger.txt', 'atlas.json', 'ai_code.py', 'legal_research_resources.txt', 'average.py', 'test_average.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/neural_network_tests.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/hello_world.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/print_numbers.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/average.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/test_average.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/circle_area.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/sum_of_naturals.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/factorial.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/my_script.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/my_code.py']", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_python_file", "args": {"filename": "Atlas/executed_code/my_script.py"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "Atlas/executed_code/my_script.py"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command read_file returned: Error: No text to summarize', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "get_hyperlinks", "args": {"url": "https://www.google.com/"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command get_hyperlinks returned: ['Obrázky (https://www.google.cz/imghp?hl=cs&tab=wi)', 'Mapy (https://maps.google.cz/maps?hl=cs&tab=wl)', 'Play (https://play.google.com/?hl=cs&tab=w8)', 'YouTube (https://www.youtube.com/?tab=w1)', 'Zprávy (https://news.google.com/?tab=wn)', 'Gmail (https://mail.google.com/mail/?tab=wm)', 'Disk (https://drive.google.com/?tab=wo)', 'Další » (https://www.google.cz/intl/cs/about/products?tab=wh)', 'Webová historie (http://www.google.cz/history/optout?hl=cs)', 'Nastavení (https://www.google.com/preferences?hl=cs)', 'Přihlásit (https://accounts.google.com/ServiceLogin?hl=cs&passive=true&continue=https://www.google.com/&ec=GAZAAQ)', 'Rozšířené vyhledávání (https://www.google.com/advanced_search?hl=cs&authuser=0)', 'Reklama (https://www.google.com/intl/cs/ads/)', 'Řešení pro firmy (http://www.google.cz/intl/cs/services/)', 'Vše o Googlu (https://www.google.com/intl/cs/about.html)', 'Google.cz (https://www.google.com/setprefdomain?prefdom=CZ&prev=https://www.google.cz/&sig=K_aMZNu8b0h5_v0oNfoIe8Wmus18I%3D)', 'Ochrana soukromí (https://www.google.com/intl/cs/policies/privacy/)', 'Smluvní podmínky (https://www.google.com/intl/cs/policies/terms/)']", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "Atlas/executed_code/my_file.txt", "text": "This is a test message written to my_file.txt."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "append_to_file", "args": {"filename": "Atlas/executed_code/my_file.txt", "text": "\\nThis is another test message appended to my_file.txt."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "Atlas/executed_code/my_file.txt"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command read_file returned: This is a test message written to my_file.txt.\nThis is another test message appended to my_file.txt.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "list_files", "args": {"directory": "Atlas/executed_code/"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command list_files returned: ['Atlas/executed_code/neural_network_tests.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/hello_world.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/print_numbers.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/average.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/test_average.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/circle_area.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/sum_of_naturals.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/factorial.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/my_script.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/my_code.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/my_file.txt']", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "delete_file", "args": {"filename": "Atlas/executed_code/my_file.txt"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command delete_file returned: File deleted successfully.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "replace_in_file", "args": {"filename": "Atlas/executed_code/my_script.py", "old_text": "# This is a test script.", "new_text": "# This is a modified test script.", "occurrence_index": "0"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command replace_in_file returned: No matches found for # This is a test script. in /home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/Atlas/executed_code/my_script.py', type='action_result')]
"""
